# Noble Villa (Building)
## Overview
**Noble Villa**

**Create** 218 Goods, 16 Influence, 204 Labor (8,920 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bar (Room)|Bar]], 1 [[Bath (Room)|Bath]], 4 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedrooms]], 2 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyards]], 4 [[Defensive Wall (Room)|Defensive Walls]], 1 [[Escape Route (Room)|Escape Route]], 2 Furnishings ([[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]] and [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]]), 1 [[Garden (Room)|Garden]], 1 [[Gatehouse (Room)|Gatehouse]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Labyrinth (Room)|Labyrinth]], 1 [[Laundry (Room)|Laundry]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Lodging (Room)|Lodging]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 2 [[Secret Room (Room)|Secret Rooms]], 2 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Rooms]], 1 [[Stall (Room)|Stall]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]], 1 [[Trophy Room (Room)|Trophy Room]], 1 [[Vault (Room)|Vault]]

A sprawling manor with luxurious grounds.
